title: Salaty — Modern Islamic App
text:
Every day we offer FREE licensed iOS apps and games you’d have to buy otherwise.
Salaty — Modern Islamic App
is available as a Giveaway of the day!
You have limited time to download, install and register it.
Salaty is a carefully designed prayer times application that integrates an intuitive clock. The thoughtfully designed clock gives you more insight into time, enabling you to easily glimpse the remaining time till upcoming prayers and the elapsed time of the current prayer.
FEATURES
- Elegant indication of the current and next prayer times on a clock interface.*
- Highlighting the remaining time of the upcoming prayers as well as the elapsed time of the current prayer.
- Displaying the Hijri Date accurately using lunar calendar server synchronization across multiple countries and timezones. For more information on the supported time zones, please visit our support page (i.e., salaty.app/support)
- Includes a calendar view that enables you to see the prayer times as well as your events.*
* not included on iPhone SE
